Description:
Detects potential "ShellDispatch.dll" functionality abuse to execute arbitrary binaries via "ShellExecute"

Author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential ShellDispatch.DLL Functionality Abuse
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\rundll32.exe' and original_file_name = 'rundll32.exe') and command like '%rundll_shellexecutew%')
